2006 – 2009 PhD Project, Engineer R&D Process at Ecole des Mines de Nantes | Nantes, France.  
Research subject: Treatment of siloxanes  by adsorption into a porous material as an application of upgrading 
biogas.  
  Several publications from 2007 -2010

2005 – 2006 Intern of MSc Engineering :  Chemistry and microbiology of water at Ecole des Mines de

Research subject : Air, volatile organic compounds and siloxanes treatment through an adsorption process into 
activated carbon . 
 
2004 (4 months) Technical Sales Engineer at Representaciones Técnicas LTDA Company | Bogota, 
Colombia.  
Technical assistance and advice on the commercialization and distribution of high technology biotechnology 
equipment. (Legal representation of New Brunswick Scientific Company, USA , and Pall Corporation, USA). 
 
2003 (3 months) Engineer at Taraira Mine Company | Taraira, Colombia.  
Resident engineer in a gold and silver extraction mine.   Assistant engineer for the design and assembly of open -
sky gold and silver mine extraction operati on. Interacted with the design department to coo rdinate joint -efforts 
and reach  feasible solutions taking into account design, cost, reliability, and time.  
 
2002 (6 months)  Intern of BSc Engineering : Chemical Eng ineer. University of los Andes | Bogota, 
Colombia.   
Research Subject : Development and optimization for the extraction process of castor oil in laboratory scale .
